name: OverPill
description:
Keep your patients poppin' pills with this fun physics based pill flinging game. 
7 fantastic rounds of medical malpractice  awaits.

Flick the right pills into the tray to win.

Check your clipboard to see the rounds requirements.

Be careful of the Dynamite (explodes on a timer) and the Nitro (explodes on contact).
